channel.title: CVE Feed for Helmholz -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Helmholz -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1779|2024-10-02T05:30:25.424Z -- helmholz -- myrex24
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability in MB Connect Lines mbCONNECT24, mymbCONNECT24 and Helmholz' myREX24 and myREX24.virtual in versions <=2.13.3 allow an authorized remote attacker with low privileges to view a limited amount of another accounts contact information.

item.title: CVE-2024-5672|2024-07-11T19:49:42.244Z -- helmholz -- rex%20100
item.description: A high privileged remote attacker can execute arbitrary system commands via GET requests due to improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command.
